CustomField.formula: IMAGE( IF( ISPICKVAL( Candidate_Rating__c , '1') , "/img/samples/stars_100.gif", IF( ISPICKVAL( Candidate_Rating__c , '2') , "/img/samples/stars_200.gif", IF( ISPICKVAL( Candidate_Rating__c , '3') , "/img/samples/stars_300.gif", IF( ISPICKVAL( Candidate_Rating__c , '4') , "/img/samples/stars_400.gif", IF( ISPICKVAL( Candidate_Rating__c , '5') , "/img/samples/stars_500.gif", "/img/samples/stars_100.gif"))))) , "Rating")
CustomField.label: Candidate Star Rating
